item.description:
SINGLES DANCE
Featuring DJ Steve Vinzi
Playing dance tunes from the 80s, 90s and contemporary “freestyle” music
(Note: TIME CHANGE)
Friday June 19th, 7:30 to 12:00pm

Enjoy friendly people with a large dance floor, and comfortable atmosphere, with singles from around Central New England.

Contact: Ozzie Tuiskula 774-262-0075 planetoz122089@aol.com

Details:

Admission is $10.00 Singles of all ages are welcome


Please dress nicely, no jeans or T-shirts


Cash Bar

Coffee will be provided Held in a non-smoking facility

** There will be a Lesson: East coast swing lesson featuring our new instructors: Nathan & Kristen.
Lesson time: 7:45 to 8:15pm sharp. (Please try to be on time).
item.how_to_find_us: 2 - 3 Tables in the back left corner of dance hall with meet up signs
item.name: Maronis Park Singles Dance
